description:
With time off comes great irresponsibility.

I like to read. I read a lot. I'll read just about anything. I like to know things. So it was, when ABC had to pay $15 million to Donald Trump's presidential library after George Stephanopoulos repeatedly (falsely) called him a rapist, we found ourselves back in the depths of the E. Jean Carroll nonsense. And, much like when I decided to read Project 2025, I got tired of reading about a book when I could just read the book myself.

I went online and checked out a copy of E. Jean Carroll's
title: Review: "What Do We Need Men For?" by E. Jean Carroll. Yes, THAT E. Jean Carroll

description:
Over six million Jews were killed during the Holocaust. The View's Sunny Hostin claims Jan. 6 was just like that, even though it was nothing like that.

Sunny Hostin intentionally compared Jan. 6 to World War II, the Holocaust, and slavery, emphasizing that America can “never forget.”

The View's Sunny Hostin is melting down: "You don't move on because January 6th was one of the worst moments in American history, like World War Two, the Holocaust, slavery." pic.twitter.com/zO6krRRgDB
— TheBlaze (@theblaze) January 6, 2025
title: Watch: Shrill harpy Sunny Hostin makes unhinged comparison of Holocaust and slavery to January 6th

description:
Kamala Harris certified her loss and the internet's reactions did not disappoint.

Girl boss slaaaaaaaay Kween! pic.twitter.com/X3EFoG2sKk
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) January 6, 2025

Firstly, no one was shy to point out that she was the first woman of color to certify her election loss.

Kamala just made history as the first woman to certify her own Presidential election loss. pic.twitter.com/yACJhseHyC
—
title: Kamala Makes History, Is First Woman Of Color To Certify Her Loss

description:
Chuck Schumer spent much of the last four years trying to convince the masses that Biden was the least bit competent. However, you can only hide the fact that the POTUS has been senile for so long.

It has since been revealed that anyone assuring the public he was anything but was intentionally deceiving Americans.

NBC aired clips of Schumer gaslighting voters into believing that Sleepy Joe was more competent than he was (although, that does not mean much). Chuck’s response, however, was even more pathetic than you might think.

Brutal.

Chuck Schumer is played a clip of him covering for Biden’s mental decline and lying about Biden’s condition then is asked what he says to Americans who feel he lied to them.

Schumer: “Look. We didn’t.”
title: Watch: Chuck Schumer stammers when confonted on covering up Joe Biden's OBVIOUS cognitive decline

description:
Last month, New York Gov. Kathy Hochul bragged that the subways were safer than ever, proudly acknowledging that crime is down. However, in just the very few days since, a woman was burned alive. That is on top of the fact that violent crime on public transportation is up over 60 percent since 2019.

The NYC subway in NYC.

A train stopped due to MTA workers finding a body on the train.

It appears the body was there for a while and decomposing.

(Repost ) pic.twitter.com/gvSBEESXDu
— Viral News NYC (@ViralNewsNYC)
title: NY Gov. Kathy Hochul brags about the new way she has made the NYC subways safer (Spoiler: She has not)

description:
To edumacate the future generation, the Garden State has decided that teachers do not need to prove they are the least bit competent, as New Jersey has ended certain skill test requirements for teachers.

We need you to take action! Last year, NJ eliminated the edTPA, a barrier to becoming a certified teacher. Now it's time to eliminate another barrier: the basic skills test for teachers. Urge Gov. Murphy to sign S1553 right away. #WEareNJEA https://t.co/XH694Vq7Eq
— NJEA (@NJEA) November 8, 2023
title: Blue state teachers don't need no education anymore, no longer need to pass a basic literacy test

description:
The deity and/or deity of content have delivered onto us this gem. A woman brimming with excitement about how she is "cooking" with her kitchen robot. That's right, kids. Because every day we stay further from God, we now live in a world where the manual labor of making your own food is too much of a burden.

So much so, we need computers to do it for us.

How to cook with a kitchen robotpic.twitter.com/ygXkPJMb2K
— Massimo (@Rainmaker1973) January 5, 2025

Two things. As far as I can tell, this video is from April 2024 that
title: Watch: Septum-ringed lady goes viral bragging about cooking with her terrifying "kitchen robot"

description:
Stop me if you've heard this one before: An unpopular progressive leader facing a major election loss against a superior BASED champion gets bullied into quitting by his own party until he bends the knee and drops out. Canadian Prime Minister Justin "I Feel Pretty" Trudeau is set to follow in the footsteps of Joe "I Feel Poopy" Biden. Just, without the obvious cognitive decline and onset dementia.

Canada's walking pile of soy and hair goop is expected to resign as head of America Jr's Liberal Party by Wednesday.

Trudeau, leader of the Liberal Party for 11 years and prime minister for nine, is facing a mounting set of crises, from
title: End of an error? Justin Trudeau expected to make shocking decision about his political future
